ibis.io

Interface DataOutput

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SerializationOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferedArrayOutputStream, ByteSerializationOutputStream, DataOutputStream, DataOutputStreamSplitter, DataSerializationOutputStream, IbisSerializationOutputStream, SingleBufferArrayOutputStream, SunSerializationOutputStream

    public interface DataOutput
    The DataOutput interface provides methods to write data.

    • Method Summary
